glosses: concerning the social sciences, literature, and sometimes a foreign language

examples.text: Sınavın sözel bölümünde çok başarılı olan Ayla, sayısal bölümde o kadar başarılı olamayınca dereceye giremedi.
examples.translation: As Ayla, who was very successful in the literature part of the examination, was not so successful in the science part, she could not place herself.

examples.text: İşsizlik parasına izinden sonra devam ettirebilmek için sözel başvuru gerekiyor.
examples.translation: To get again the dole after going on a leave, a verbal application (address) is necessary.

etymology: By surface analysis, söz (“word”) + -el. Coined by Mazhar Leventoğlu in 1968.
